subject: St. Mark Matters $ Partners.
body:
St. Mark Matters $ Partners.
Email: 
attorneymark066@gmail.com
Tel/Fax: +1 (856)499-4242
Date: 14th Nov, 2023.
Dear,
This is to inform you that after our several petitions against the paying bank over the delay in releasing your already approved fund with its accumulated interest, we have today
being 14th Nov, 2023, received an official Re-approval notification and unconditional  fund release signal in your favor, 
so please 
urgently reconfirm your bank details
 for immediate submission to the paying bank and your data for re-validation.
Full Name:
Address:
Direct Mobile No:
Scan copy of your Identity
:
DOB:
Have a great day while waiting to hear from you soonest.
Yours in service
Barrister Mark H. Safar.
Principal Partners/ Owner, St. Mark Matters & Partners.
Tel/Fax: +1 (856)499-4242. Email: 
attorneymark066@gmail.com

subject: Re: St. Mark Matters $ Partners.
body:
Hello Barrister Mark H. Safar,

Thank you for your message and the work you've been doing on my behalf. It's great to hear that there has been progress with the fund release.

Before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about this process? I'm interested in understanding how it works and what steps are involved. 

Also, could you clarify what exactly the "official and fund release signal" means? Is there any documentation or reference number related to this?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Wayne
